Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes. NOTE: Rating-related tables and methods were removed per request (only reviews themselves are stored).

    • markQuestionAsFAQ

      public boolean markQuestionAsFAQ(FAQ faq, User actingUser)
      Mark a question as FAQ, but only if the acting user has STAFF or ADMIN role.
      Parameters:
      faq - the FAQ object to create
      actingUser - the user attempting the action
      Returns:
      true if FAQ was created successfully; false if unauthorized or failed

    • isQuestionMarkedAsFAQ

      public boolean isQuestionMarkedAsFAQ(int questionId)
      Returns whether the provided question is already present in the faqs table.
      Parameters:
      questionId - the question id to check
      Returns:
      true if the question is already marked as an FAQ, false otherwise

    • removeQuestionFromFAQ

      public boolean removeQuestionFromFAQ(int questionId)
      Backwards-compatible removal without an acting user. This removes the FAQ entry unconditionally (no permission check). Use carefully prefer removeQuestionFromFAQ(int, User) when permissions matter.
      Parameters:
      questionId - the FAQ question id to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed successfully, false otherwise

    • getAllFAQs

      public List<FAQ> getAllFAQs()
      Load all FAQ entries. Returns FAQ objects enriched with the question title (if available) and ordered by category and the date they were marked.
      Returns:
      List of FAQ objects (empty list if none)

    • updateFAQ

      public boolean updateFAQ(FAQ faq)
      Update FAQ details

    • questionHasSolution

      public boolean questionHasSolution(int questionId)
      Returns true if any answer for the given question is marked as a solution.
      Parameters:
      questionId - the question id to check
      Returns:
      true if at least one answer has is_solution = TRUE

    • getSolutionForQuestion

      public Answer getSolutionForQuestion(int questionId)
      Get the solution answer for a question

    • getSolutionsForQuestion

      public List<Answer> getSolutionsForQuestion(int questionId)
      Return all answers for a question that are marked as solutions.
      Parameters:
      questionId - the question id to load solutions for
      Returns:
      list of Answer objects where is_solution = TRUE (possibly empty)

    • createAnnouncement

      public boolean createAnnouncement(Announcement announcement)
      Persist a new Announcement. The provided Announcement object must contain at least title, content, priority, startDate and displayType. The created_by_staff_id should refer to a staff user.
      Parameters:
      announcement - Announcement to create
      Returns:
      true on success

    • getAllAnnouncements

      public List<Announcement> getAllAnnouncements()
      Load all announcements and the staff user name who created each one.
      Returns:
      list of Announcement objects (empty list if none)

    • getActiveAnnouncementsForUser

      public List<Announcement> getActiveAnnouncementsForUser(int userId)
      Get active announcements for a user (H2 syntax)

    • updateAnnouncement

      public boolean updateAnnouncement(Announcement announcement)
      Update an announcement (H2 syntax)

    • deleteAnnouncement

      public boolean deleteAnnouncement(int announcementId)
      Delete an announcement (H2 syntax)

    • markAnnouncementAsRead

      public boolean markAnnouncementAsRead(int announcementId, int userId)
      Create or update a user->announcement read mark. Uses a MERGE/UPSERT pattern so calling this repeatedly is idempotent.
      Parameters:
      announcementId - the announcement id to mark as read
      userId - the user id who read it
      Returns:
      true on success, false otherwise

    • hasUserReadAnnouncement

      public boolean hasUserReadAnnouncement(int announcementId, int userId)
      Returns whether a user has previously read the specified announcement.
      Parameters:
      announcementId - announcement id
      userId - user id
      Returns:
      true if mark exists, false otherwise
